name: Eric Marquis
coverLetter:
Hi! I'm trained in farm work. I've been picking grapes in Baja Cali for 10 years. I'm also trained in winemaking but I want to make money trimming during the harvest season.  I prefer California more than anywhere else.
I do need shelter accommodations and perhaps one meal a day.
I'm a very hard working man and I can work for extended periods of time. Up to 16hrs. Daily.  
Thank you for your consideration.

Sincerely: Eric Marquis.
Contact: ericsarquis18@gmail.com
